page.title: 11TOURISM, SEAFORD
page.content: {THE SEAFORD AREA}IS A PERFECT PLACE FOR A QUIET HOLIDAY,WITH THE SEA TO SWIM IN WHEN IT'S WARM AND THE {COUNTRYSIDE}FOR WALKS. THERE ARE PLENTY OF SMALL{GUESTHOUSES AND HOTELS TO STAY IN. IN THE TOWN THERE ARE LOTS OF{RESTAURANTS}TO EAT IN. THE{MARTELLO {TOWER}HAS BEEN TURNED INTO A{LOCAL {MUSEUM.} THERE'S ALSO {ST.LEONARDS {CHURCH}TO VISIT AND THERE ARE LOTS MORE BUILDINGS OF INTEREST IN THE TOWN. NEARBY{CUCKMERE VALLEY}OFFERS MANY ATTRACTIONS INCLUDING{THE SEVEN {SISTERS COUNTRY PARK}AND{FRISTON {FOREST. THERE ARE{TWO GOLF COURSES, A {SAILING CLUB AND AN ANGLING CLUB. } THE{TOWN CENTRE}HAS A LOT OF HANDY LITTLE SHOPS}IN IT. ALL IN ALL SEAFORD IS A LOVELY PLACE TO STAY IN.
